Proland Documentation - Atmo plugin

The Proland atmo plugin provides a static method to precompute 2D and 3D textures allowing the rendering of atmospheric effects in real-time from all viewpoints and for all Sun directions (based on the paper "Precomputed Atmospheric Scattering", Eric Bruneton and Fabrice Neyret, Eurographics 2008). This plugin does not depend on any other plugin.

Look at the "atmo" example to see how to use these textures.
